Who is able to supply info on the Sugi family ? They were major vassal of t=
he =C3=94uchi and had more than one branch. I find in my files Sugi Shigeak=
i in 1399, his grandson Yoriaki in 1413. Later, around 1480/90, Sugi Shiget=
aka, Shigechika and Takemichi were high officials of the =C3=94uchi. At the=
 beginning of the XVIe century, some were among counsellors of the =C3=94uc=
hi's head (Shigenori, Okinaga) while others served as shugodai of Buzen and=
 Chikuzen. In 1528, for instance, Okitsura, son of Okifusa, was shugodai of=
 Chikuzen but two years later, the shugodai of that province seems to have =
been Okizazu. At the time of the fall of the =C3=94uchi, the counsellor Sug=
i Shigemasa revolted and joined Sue while Sugi Okitsura choose to die like =
his master =C3=94uchi Yoshitaka in 1551. In 1554, a Sugi Takayasu was kille=
d in Chikugo, fighting against M=C3=B4ri Motonari. All this is a bit confus=
ing and would be glad to understand the relationship between those various =
members of the Sugi clan as well as their history. Thank you
